name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (Friend)
description:
Stalk, trap, and banish your enemies with the flames of your spirit in Graveyard Shift, where ghosts meet on haunted grounds for a night of fierce competition!

In this first person, networked game, the haunter hides in a sea of AI controlled doppelgangers, hoping to avoid the three seekers competing against each other to be the first to bring the haunter down

Come out, come out wherever you are
